duties_responsibilities.duty: Accurately replenish pick line product flow locations to assure continual product availability for pick/pack operation.
Operate forklift safely and assist with cycle counts and physical inventory processes.
Use Cirrus replenishment unit to make sure that all physical transfers are accurately made in the system.
Maintain hardware in good condition and communicate with Lead and Supervisor for necessary job-related information.
Clean and maintain a safe, organized work area and maintain a productivity rate based on standards set by DC Management.
Maintain timekeeping policy and perform other duties as assigned.
